radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild right lower lobe atelectasis and trace right pleural fluid. Mild hepatic steatosis with a fat fraction of approximately 5%. An 8 mm cyst in the right lobe of the liver. Gallbladder is distended with mild wall edema and multiple stones. Small amount of pericholecystic fat stranding and edema. Tiny 3 mm cystic lesion in the uncinate process and a tiny 2 mm cystic lesion in the body of the pancreas, likely side branch IPMNs. Several prominent periportal lymph nodes measuring up to 10 mm. Mild atherosclerotic plaque noted in the abdominal aorta.
